All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
AbstractDAO class provides common functionality for Data Access Objects.
Client
The Client class represents a client entity.
ClientDAO
ClientDAO is a data access object class that extends AbstractDAO for performing database operations specifically for the Client entity.
ClientDTO
ClientDTO represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for a client entity.
ClientLogic
ClientLogic class provides methods to handle business logic operations related to clients.
ConnectionFactory
ConnectionFactory class provides methods to establish database connections.
Controller
Controller class acts as an intermediary between the GUI (user interface) and the logic layer.
Main
The main entry point for the Orders Management application.
Order
The Order class represents an order entity.
OrderDAO
OrderDAO is a data access object class that extends AbstractDAO for performing database operations specifically for the Order entity.
OrderDTO
OrderDTO represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for an order entity.
OrderLogic
OrderLogic class provides methods to handle business logic operations related to orders.
Product
The Product class represents a product entity.
ProductDAO
ProductDAO is a data access object class that extends AbstractDAO for performing database operations specifically for the Product entity.
ProductDTO
ProductDTO represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for a product entity.
ProductLogic
ProductLogic class provides methods to handle business logic operations related to products.
Reflection
Reflection is a utility class that provides methods to retrieve metadata and values of fields from an object using Java Reflection.
View
The View class represents the graphical user interface for the application.
